name: MultiValueMapTest
description: Unit tests for the MultiValueMap class, focusing on various operations and functionalities.

methods.name: createTestMap
methods.signature: <C extends Collection<V>> MultiValueMap<K, V> createTestMap(Class<C> collectionClass)

methods.name: deserialize
methods.signature: Object deserialize(byte[] data) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException

test_cases.name: testContainsValue
test_cases.description: Tests the containsValue method of MultiValueMap to check if it correctly identifies the presence of values.

test_cases.name: testContainsValue_Key
test_cases.description: Tests the containsValue method of MultiValueMap with key-value pairs to check if it correctly identifies the presence of specific values for a given key.

test_cases.name: testEmptyMapCompatibility
test_cases.description: Tests the compatibility of an empty MultiValueMap by comparing it with a deserialized version.

test_cases.name: testFullMapCompatibility
test_cases.description: Tests the compatibility of a full MultiValueMap by comparing it with a deserialized version.

test_cases.name: testGetCollection
test_cases.description: Tests the get method of MultiValueMap to ensure it returns the correct collection associated with a key.

test_cases.name: testIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the iterator method of MultiValueMap to ensure it correctly iterates over the map entries.

test_cases.name: testIterator_Key
test_cases.description: Tests the iterator method of MultiValueMap with a specific key to ensure it correctly iterates over the values associated with that key.

test_cases.name: testKeyContainsValue
test_cases.description: Tests the containsValue method of MultiValueMap with key-value pairs to check if it correctly identifies the presence of specific values for a given key.

test_cases.name: testKeyedIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the iterator method of MultiValueMap with a specific key to ensure it correctly iterates over the values associated with that key.

test_cases.name: testMapEquals
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method of MultiValueMap to ensure it correctly compares two MultiValueMap instances.

test_cases.name: testMultipleValues
test_cases.description: Tests the get method of MultiValueMap to ensure it returns the correct collection of multiple values associated with a key.

test_cases.name: testNoMappingReturnsNull
test_cases.description: Tests the get method of MultiValueMap to ensure it returns null when no mapping exists for a given key.

test_cases.name: testPutAll_KeyCollection
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll method of MultiValueMap to ensure it correctly adds multiple values to a key.

test_cases.name: testPutAll_Map1
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll method of MultiValueMap to ensure it correctly merges another MultiValueMap into the current one.

test_cases.name: testPutAll_Map2
test_cases.description: Tests the putAll method of MultiValueMap to ensure it correctly merges a standard Map into the current MultiValueMap.

test_cases.name: testPutWithList
test_cases.description: Tests the put method of MultiValueMap with a list collection to ensure it correctly adds values to a key.

test_cases.name: testPutWithSet
test_cases.description: Tests the put method of MultiValueMap with a set collection to ensure it correctly adds values to a key.

test_cases.name: testRemove_KeyItem
test_cases.description: Tests the removeMapping method of MultiValueMap to ensure it correctly removes a specific value from a key.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAllViaEntryIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the iterator method of MultiValueMap to ensure it correctly removes all entries when using the iterator's remove method.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAllViaIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the values method of MultiValueMap to ensure it correctly removes all values when using the iterator's remove method.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAllViaKeyedIterator
test_cases.description: Tests the iterator method of MultiValueMap with a specific key to ensure it correctly removes all values associated with that key.

test_cases.name: testSize
test_cases.description: Tests the size method of MultiValueMap to ensure it correctly returns the number of keys in the map.

test_cases.name: testSize_Key
test_cases.description: Tests the size method of MultiValueMap with a specific key to ensure it correctly returns the number of values associated with that key.

test_cases.name: testTotalSize
test_cases.description: Tests the totalSize method of MultiValueMap to ensure it correctly returns the total number of values in the map.

test_cases.name: testTotalSizeA
test_cases.description: Tests the totalSize method of MultiValueMap to ensure it correctly returns the total number of values in a specific test map.

test_cases.name: testUnsafeDeSerialization
test_cases.description: Tests the serialization and deserialization methods of MultiValueMap to ensure they correctly handle unsafe deserialization.

test_cases.name: testValueCollectionType
test_cases.description: Tests the get method of MultiValueMap to ensure it returns the correct collection type (LinkedList) associated with a key.

test_cases.name: testValues
test_cases.description: Tests the values method of MultiValueMap to ensure it correctly returns all values in the map.
